Class Topology

java.lang.Object
  fr.univrennes1.cri.jtacl.core.topology.Topology

public class Topology
extends java.lang.Object

This class describes the topology of the network.

Author:
Patrick Lamaiziere

Constructor Detail

Topology

public Topology()
Method Detail

makeTopology

public void makeTopology()
Builds the topology of the network. The topology is describes by some network links which describe the links beetween ifaces.

registerNetworkequipment

public void registerNetworkequipment(NetworkEquipment equipment)
                              throws JtaclTopologyException
Registers an equipment into the topology.

Parameters:
equipment - the NetworkEquipment equipment to register.
Throws:
JtaclTopologyException - if the equipment is already registered.

isRegistered

public boolean isRegistered(NetworkEquipment equipment)
Cheks if a NetworkEquipment equipment is registered into the topology.

Parameters:
equipment - the equipment to test.
Returns:
true if the equipment is registered into the topology.

getEquipment

public NetworkEquipment getEquipment(java.lang.String name)
Returns the NetworkEquipment equipment associated with the name in argument.

Parameters:
name - the name of the equipment to retrieve.
Returns:
the equipment associated with this name. Null if the equipment is unknown.

getNetworkLinks

public NetworkLinks getNetworkLinks()
Returns all the NetworkLink links in the topology.

Returns:
a NetworkLinks list containing the links.

getNetworkLinksByNetwork

public NetworkLinks getNetworkLinksByNetwork(IPNet network)
Returns all the NetworkLink links that match this IPNet network.

Parameters:
network - the IPNet network of the NetworkLink links.
Returns:
a NetworkLinks list containing the links.

getNetworkLinksByIP

public NetworkLinks getNetworkLinksByIP(IPNet ip)
Returns all the NetworkLink links containing this IPNet IP on their subnet.

Parameters:
ip - the IPNet IP Address contained by the NetworkLink links.
Returns:
a NetworkLinks list containing the links.
Throws:
JtaclTopologyException - if an item can not be expressed as a network.

getNetworkLinksByEquipment

public NetworkLinks getNetworkLinksByEquipment(NetworkEquipment equipment)
Returns all the NetworkLink links connected to a NetworkEquipment equipment.

Parameters:
equipment - the NetworkEquipment equipment connected.
Returns:
a NetworkLinks list containing the links.

addTopologicalLink

public void addTopologicalLink(boolean borderLink,
                               java.lang.String sNetwork,
                               java.lang.String strLinks)
Creates and adds a TopologicalLink link into the topology.

Parameters:
borderLink - set to true if the link to add is a border link.
sNetwork - the network address of the link.
strLinks - A textual representaton of the links beetween equipment. The format is equipment-addressIP, equipement-addressIP, ...
See Also:
TopologicalLink
